calculations.name: Radial Normalised Length
calculations.tableau_expression:
[Parameters].[Radial Inner] + 
IIF(ATTR([Path Order]) = 0 , 0  
    ,SUM([Radial Field])/WINDOW_MAX(SUM([Radial Field])) * ([Parameters].[Radial Outer]-[Parameters].[Radial Inner])
)

calculation_context.Expression:
[Parameters].[Radial Inner] + 
IIF(ATTR([Path Order]) = 0 , 0  
    ,SUM([Radial Field])/WINDOW_MAX(SUM([Radial Field])) * ([Parameters].[Radial Outer]-[Parameters].[Radial Inner])
)
